header_text: It's a warm day, and you and your friends are taking a walk outside. You notice that you are starting to sweat, and you can see some marks on your shirt. You know these friends well, and they will not care.

elements.Text: Will your friends make fun of your sweat marks on your shirt?

elements.name: It's a warm day, and you and your friends are taking a walk outside. You notice that you are starting to sweat, and you can see some marks on your shirt. You know these friends well, and they will not care._Physical Health_comp_question
